mapper.select: SELECT m.uid, m.user_id, m.user_name, m.user_rank FROM tbl_member m, tbl_member_detail d WHERE m.uid = d.uid
SELECT m.uid, m.user_id, m.user_name, m.user_rank, d.phone_num, d.addr, d.addr_detail, d.zip_code FROM tbl_member m, tbl_member_detail d WHERE m.uid = #{userUid} AND m.uid = d.uid
